content.detail: As a kid, I mastered touch typing from a Timon and Pumbaa game created by Disney Interactive Studios. When the Internet became more available, I learned HTML and CSS from playing Neopets. A few years later, I had an internship at the same Disney division that created so many of the computer games I grew up with. And soon after that, I would be part of a Disney initiative that taught me how to code.

content.title: Education
content.detail: My education has specialized in database design, software engineering, and human-computer interaction. My professional experience includes work with content management systems and scalable website solutions around the world and across brands under The Walt Disney Company.
